namespace Java.Sql

Contains .NET proxy types for Java classes from the package java.sql.

See:
          Description

Type Summary
Array .NET proxy type for interface java.sql.Array.
The mapping in the Java programming language for the SQL type ARRAY.
BatchUpdateException .NET proxy type for class java.sql.BatchUpdateException.
The subclass of Java.Sql.SQLException thrown when an error occurs during a batch update operation.
Blob .NET proxy type for interface java.sql.Blob.
The representation (mapping) in the Java™ programming language of an SQL BLOB value.
CallableStatement .NET proxy type for interface java.sql.CallableStatement.
ClientInfoStatus .NET proxy type for enum java.sql.ClientInfoStatus.
Enumeration for status of the reason that a property could not be set via a call to Connection.setClientInfo
Clob .NET proxy type for interface java.sql.Clob.
The mapping in the Java™ programming language for the SQL CLOB type.
Connection .NET proxy type for interface java.sql.Connection.
A connection (session) with a specific database.
DataTruncation .NET proxy type for class java.sql.DataTruncation.
An exception thrown as a DataTruncation exception (on writes) or reported as a DataTruncation warning (on reads) when a data values is unexpectedly truncated for reasons other than its having exceeded MaxFieldSize.
DatabaseMetaData .NET proxy type for interface java.sql.DatabaseMetaData.
Date .NET proxy type for class java.sql.Date.
A thin wrapper around a millisecond value that allows JDBC to identify this as an SQL DATE value.
Driver .NET proxy type for interface java.sql.Driver.
The interface that every driver class must implement.
DriverAction .NET proxy type for interface java.sql.DriverAction.
An interface that must be implemented when a wants to be notified by DriverManager.
DriverManager .NET proxy type for class java.sql.DriverManager.
The basic service for managing a set of JDBC drivers.
DriverPropertyInfo .NET proxy type for class java.sql.DriverPropertyInfo.
Driver properties for making a connection.
JDBCType .NET proxy type for enum java.sql.JDBCType.
Defines the constants that are used to identify generic SQL types, called JDBC types.
NClob .NET proxy type for interface java.sql.NClob.
The mapping in the Java™ programming language for the SQL NCLOB type.
ParameterMetaData .NET proxy type for interface java.sql.ParameterMetaData.
An object that can be used to get information about the types and properties for each parameter marker in a PreparedStatement object.
PreparedStatement .NET proxy type for interface java.sql.PreparedStatement.
PseudoColumnUsage .NET proxy type for enum java.sql.PseudoColumnUsage.
Enumeration for pseudo/hidden column usage.
Ref .NET proxy type for interface java.sql.Ref.
The mapping in the Java programming language of an SQL REF value, which is a reference to an SQL structured type value in the database.
ResultSet .NET proxy type for interface java.sql.ResultSet.
ResultSetMetaData .NET proxy type for interface java.sql.ResultSetMetaData.
An object that can be used to get information about the types and properties of the columns in a ResultSet object.
RowId .NET proxy type for interface java.sql.RowId.
The representation (mapping) in the Java programming language of an SQL ROWID value.
RowIdLifetime .NET proxy type for enum java.sql.RowIdLifetime.
Enumeration for RowId life-time values.
SQLClientInfoException .NET proxy type for class java.sql.SQLClientInfoException.
The subclass of Java.Sql.SQLException is thrown when one or more client info properties could not be set on a Connection.
SQLData .NET proxy type for interface java.sql.SQLData.
The interface used for the custom mapping of an SQL user-defined type (UDT) to a class in the Java programming language.
SQLDataException .NET proxy type for class java.sql.SQLDataException.
The subclass of Java.Sql.SQLException thrown when the SQLState class value is '22', or under vendor-specified conditions.
SQLException .NET proxy type for class java.sql.SQLException.
An exception that provides information on a database access error or other errors.
SQLFeatureNotSupportedException .NET proxy type for class java.sql.SQLFeatureNotSupportedException.
The subclass of Java.Sql.SQLException thrown when the SQLState class value is '0A' ( the value is 'zero' A).
SQLInput .NET proxy type for interface java.sql.SQLInput.
SQLIntegrityConstraintViolationException .NET proxy type for class java.sql.SQLIntegrityConstraintViolationException.
The subclass of Java.Sql.SQLException thrown when the SQLState class value is '23', or under vendor-specified conditions.
SQLInvalidAuthorizationSpecException .NET proxy type for class java.sql.SQLInvalidAuthorizationSpecException.
The subclass of Java.Sql.SQLException thrown when the SQLState class value is '28', or under vendor-specified conditions.
SQLNonTransientConnectionException .NET proxy type for class java.sql.SQLNonTransientConnectionException.
The subclass of Java.Sql.SQLException thrown for the SQLState class value '08', or under vendor-specified conditions.
SQLNonTransientException .NET proxy type for class java.sql.SQLNonTransientException.
The subclass of Java.Sql.SQLException thrown when an instance where a retry of the same operation would fail unless the cause of the SQLException is corrected.
SQLOutput .NET proxy type for interface java.sql.SQLOutput.
SQLPermission .NET proxy type for class java.sql.SQLPermission.
The permission for which the SecurityManager will check when code that is running an application with a SecurityManager enabled, calls the DriverManager.deregisterDriver method, DriverManager.setLogWriter method, DriverManager.setLogStream (deprecated) method, SyncFactory.setJNDIContext method, SyncFactory.setLogger method, Connection.setNetworktimeout method, or the Connection.abort method.
SQLRecoverableException .NET proxy type for class java.sql.SQLRecoverableException.
The subclass of Java.Sql.SQLException thrown in situations where a previously failed operation might be able to succeed if the application performs some recovery steps and retries the entire transaction or in the case of a distributed transaction, the transaction branch.
SQLSyntaxErrorException .NET proxy type for class java.sql.SQLSyntaxErrorException.
The subclass of Java.Sql.SQLException thrown when the SQLState class value is '42', or under vendor-specified conditions.
SQLTimeoutException .NET proxy type for class java.sql.SQLTimeoutException.
The subclass of Java.Sql.SQLException thrown when the timeout specified by Statement.setQueryTimeout, DriverManager.setLoginTimeout, DataSource.setLoginTimeout,XADataSource.setLoginTimeout has expired.
SQLTransactionRollbackException .NET proxy type for class java.sql.SQLTransactionRollbackException.
The subclass of Java.Sql.SQLException thrown when the SQLState class value is '40', or under vendor-specified conditions.
SQLTransientConnectionException .NET proxy type for class java.sql.SQLTransientConnectionException.
The subclass of Java.Sql.SQLException for the SQLState class value '08', or under vendor-specified conditions.
SQLTransientException .NET proxy type for class java.sql.SQLTransientException.
The subclass of Java.Sql.SQLException is thrown in situations where a previously failed operation might be able to succeed when the operation is retried without any intervention by application-level functionality.
SQLType .NET proxy type for interface java.sql.SQLType.
An object that is used to identify a generic SQL type, called a JDBC type or a vendor specific data type.
SQLWarning .NET proxy type for class java.sql.SQLWarning.
An exception that provides information on database access warnings.
SQLXML .NET proxy type for interface java.sql.SQLXML.
The mapping in the JavaTM programming language for the SQL XML type.
Savepoint .NET proxy type for interface java.sql.Savepoint.
The representation of a savepoint, which is a point within the current transaction that can be referenced from the Connection.rollback method.
Statement .NET proxy type for interface java.sql.Statement.
Struct .NET proxy type for interface java.sql.Struct.
The standard mapping in the Java programming language for an SQL structured type.
Time .NET proxy type for class java.sql.Time.
A thin wrapper around the java.util.Date class that allows the JDBC API to identify this as an SQL TIME value.
Timestamp .NET proxy type for class java.sql.Timestamp.
A thin wrapper around java.util.Date that allows the JDBC API to identify this as an SQL TIMESTAMP value.
Types .NET proxy type for class java.sql.Types.
The class that defines the constants that are used to identify generic SQL types, called JDBC types.
Wrapper .NET proxy type for interface java.sql.Wrapper.
Interface for JDBC classes which provide the ability to retrieve the delegate instance when the instance in question is in fact a proxy class.
 

namespace Java.Sql Description
